text: 1812 () is a 1912 Russian silent drama movie directed by Vasili Goncharov, Kai Hansen and Aleksandr Uralsky. It stars Vasili Goncharov, Aleksandra Goncharova, and Andrey Gromov. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:Russian silent movies Category:1912 drama movies Category:1910s historical movies Category:Movies set in the 1810s Category:Movies directed by Vasili Goncharov
title: 1812 (1912 movie)
